entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add a DequeueEnqueue method to the PriorityQueue Type #75070
  • [Bug]: At runtime sometimes the wrong overload is selected. #75069
  • AssemblyLoadContext is unloading or was already unloaded. #75067
  • Linq IntersectBy() just returns first item on same keySelector #75066

Closed

  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\muldimjagary\\muldimjagary\\muldimjagary.cmd #74541
    7.0.0
  • Dependency injection logging for analyzing the object creation number of times #41792
    Future
  • Mono crash in System.Net.Requests tests on linux-arm64 #74667
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\keepalive\\keepalive.cmd #74731
    8.0.0
  • Task.Delay in UI app takes too long on macOS #75065
  • Runtime_72845 timing out in gcstress #73808
    8.0.0
  • Minimum .NET SDK version updated to 7.0.100 Preview 7 #73971
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace assert with BADCODE #75068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Add a few more riscv64 stubs in PAL #74793
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • System.Net.Requests: Pick correct RemoteExecutor overload in test #74994
    area-System.Net
  • Remove unnecessary LoaderHeap asserts #74995
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Simplify JitDisasm matching behavior #74430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Mark an F# test as GC stress incompatible #75001
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix undefined behavior issues in aarch64 #75029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] add simd testing on ci #75064
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • add ability to set GCName via runtimeconfig. #74831
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Make OP_WASM_SIMD_SWIZZLE use the shufflevector LLVM ins… #75057
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono] Enable a bunch of System.Net tests on Windows #75010
    area-System.Net
  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix `Exp10M1(TSelf)` and `Round(TSelf, MidpointRounding)` #75063
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Change LibrariesConfiguration defaults in tests #75033
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Optimize the performance of InternalConfigurationRootExtensions.GetChildrenImplementation #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Update Roslyn compiler build #75058

entry.content:
Issues

Created

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Summary of FileStreamHttpResult.cs is incorrect. #43744
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext, plaintext_nodejs #43743
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, mvc #43742
  • .Net 7 ApiAuthorization compatibility with Identity Server 6.1.x #43741
  • Perf regression: fortunes #43740
  • blazor wasm project deployed with error #43738

Closed

  • Two endpoints are handling the request when use DynamicRouteValueTransformer #28702
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #43735
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #43736
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #43739
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext_nodejs #43731

PullRequests

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1983737 #43599
    area-infrastructure
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Avoid client result invocation ID collisions #43716
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0]: Throw if a by ref type is returned to avoid making invalid IL #43733
    area-runtime
  • [7.0-rc2] Allow spaces between the url and http version #43704 #43706
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [6.0] Allow spaces between the url and http version #43704
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET MAUI Maps custom object in map Pin #9909
  • .NET MAUI maps custom vector map capability #9908
  • .NET MAUI maps offline or caching capability #9907
  • [MAUI-Windows] "Element not found. (0x80070490)" exception occurs when ScrollView is inside a FlexLayout #9905
  • The image is not rendered on iOS only the first time #9902
  • Image size is not stable on MacOS and iOS #9899
  • Directory.GetFiles/CreateDirectory/Exists..etc throw System.UnauthorizedAccessException when only a folder is specified #9898
  • Android Emulator Tries to Start but then Crashes and Disappears #9897

Closed

  • Exception occurs when using System.IO.Ports #9870
  • Review code in Shell that's there to prevent overdraw on the navbar/statusbar #5217
    7.0-rc2
  • Entry controls don't play well in any layout if you want them to be side by side #9906
  • Geolocation functionality never return any result and hangs even with timeout set to 10 seconds #9895

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove SplitDrawable from Shell code #9896

Updated

  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 Planning
  • [Android] Update Entry behavior closing the Keyboard #7635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 7.0-rc2
  • [Android] Fix crash using a Name in a GradientStop #9865
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, high
  • Build the net6 templates in net7 #9758
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
